Office of Budget and Financial Administration     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Office of Budget and Financial Administration      Office of Budget and Financial Administration   Main Menu    About           Office of Budget and Financial Analysis         Contact Us     Eyebrow menu    Office of the Chancellor    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      Office of Budget and Financial Analysis      View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Office of Budget and Financial Administration    About Us    Office of Budget and Financial Analysis        Welcome to the Office of Budget and Financial Analysis at the University of Illinois at Chicago  The office is the principal staff arm of the Chancellor and Provost in the areas of financial planning, budget and financial policy analysis, and fiscal administration. In this capacity, the office provides analyses of policies and programs, assists in the determination of campus priorities and strategies, guides the annual budgetary process, and monitors fund allocations.
